title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6059.5 - Informational Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6059.5 - Informational Reporting

State Regulations

Firearm license appeals officers shall submit quarterly
reports to the appeals board indicating, by category, the total number of
appeals decided within the quarterly reporting period resulting from: (i) denials of firearm license
applications, (ii)
denials of
firearm license renewals, (iii)
denials of firearm license recertifications, and
(iv)
revocation of firearm licenses, and the
number of such appeal decisions during the quarterly reporting period that
affirm the licensing officer's denial of a firearm license application, renewal, or recertification, or the revocation of a firearm license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6059.5

Adopted

New

York State Register October 23, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 43, eff. 10/23/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
